alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:00PM CST until January 29 at 6:20AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. For the Marais Des Cygnes River...including La Cygne...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Low lying farmland and other rural land floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 27.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 8.4 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Sun Sun 12am 6am 12pm Marais Des Cygnes River La Cygne 25.0 27.9 Sat 7pm 27.2 25.4 18.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/.
